name: Escape From Single Room
description:
You are out of your city for a business deal.

The deal getting delayed, so you decided to relax in a single room cottage in that area for a day.

You relaxed yourself and then decided to go out for the business deal. The door gets jammed and can’t able to open.

You are trapped inside Single Room and have to escape from the place.

Use the clues and objects to come out of the room.

It’s getting late for the business deal.

Come out quickly………
